article: Have you ever  heard of  a girl of 15, who has opened up a company of her own? Linda is such a girl. She  _  the business two years ago. She has already  _  several successful computer games. They are so  _  that over half a million people work in her business. And she is  _  at school. She enjoys school and comes to school  _  . She is always on time.  _  weekdays, she goes to school in her own car with a  _  , for she is not  old enough  to drive. She enjoys school and is very  _  in all of her lessons. She usually gets "A" in the exams, so  the other  students often ask her for  _  . After dinner, she goes to her office and  keeps  working on her computer, writing games until 2 a.m. She does not usually need as much  _  as other children in the night. What  _  successful girl Linda is!
